snippet: Lufthansa of Germany and Air France will avoid the Sinai region until it is clear what brought down the Russian commercial jet, killing 224.
abstract: Lufthansa and Air France will reroute flights over Egypt’s Sinai region until officials can determine why Russian commercial jet crashed there; disaster, occurring in area where Egyptian military is battling Islamist insurgency, raises concerns that incident may be related to armed conflict.
lead_paragraph: Lufthansa of Germany and Air France will avoid the Sinai region until it is clear what brought down the Russian commercial jet, killing 224.

headline.main: Airlines Reroute Flights After Russian Crash in Egypt
headline.print_headline: Lufthansa and Air France to Avoid Sinai Region Routes Pending Details of Crash
